Spring's Dawning.name: Spring's Dawning
Spring's Dawning.fullText:
Warrior of Spring Attack 11Spring's Dawning

The light of spring erupts from the spirit world, searing your foes and providing a beacon of hope to your allies.

Encounter        Implement, Primal, Radiant, Spirit
Standard Action      Close burst spirit 1

Target: Each enemy in the burst

Attack: Wisdom vs. Will

Hit: 3d6 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage.

Effect: The first time you hit a target when you use this power, each ally can make a saving throw with a +2 power bonus.


Update (2/8/2010)
Delete the second sentence of the Hit entry. Add an Effect entry below the Hit entry that reads: “Effect: The first time you hit a target when you use this power, each ally can make a saving throw with a +2 power bonus.” The power’s intent is to grant a saving throw to each ally once. As a close attack, the effect on the Hit entry might trigger multiple times. This change ensures that the effect occurs only once each time you use the power.

Published in Primal Power, page(s) 85.
Spring's Dawning.flavor: The light of spring erupts from the spirit world, searing your foes and providing a beacon of hope to your allies.
Spring's Dawning.effect: The first time you hit a target when you use this power, each ally can make a saving throw with a +2 power bonus.

Spring's Resurgence.name: Spring's Resurgence
Spring's Resurgence.fullText:
Warrior of Spring Attack 20Spring's Resurgence

You call forth the power of spring’s resurgence, lending strength to your allies with the demise of each enemy.

Daily        Healing, Implement, Primal, Zone
Free Action      Area burst 2 within 10 squares

Trigger: An enemy within 10 squares of you drops to 0 hit points

Target: Each enemy in the burst centered on the triggering enemy

Attack: Wisdom vs. Will

Hit: 5d6 + Wisdom modifier damage.

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: The burst creates a zone of verdure that lasts until the end of the encounter. Any bloodied ally who starts his or her turn within the zone regains 10 hit points. When any enemy within the zone drops to 0 hit points, each ally within the zone regains 10 hit points.


Published in Primal Power, page(s) 85.
Spring's Resurgence.flavor: You call forth the power of spring’s resurgence, lending strength to your allies with the demise of each enemy.
Spring's Resurgence.trigger: An enemy within 10 squares of you drops to 0 hit points
Spring's Resurgence.target: Each enemy in the burst centered on the triggering enemy
Spring's Resurgence.effect: The burst creates a zone of verdure that lasts until the end of the encounter. Any bloodied ally who starts his or her turn within the zone regains 10 hit points. When any enemy within the zone drops to 0 hit points, each ally within the zone regains 10 hit points.

Hope Beyond Death.name: Hope Beyond Death
Hope Beyond Death.fullText:
Warrior of Spring Utility 12Hope Beyond Death

Although winter might empty fields, cast leaves from trees, and freeze rivers, the world blooms anew at spring’s return.

Daily        Primal
Immediate Interrupt      Ranged 10

Trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you fails a death saving throw

Target: The triggering ally

Effect: The target is considered to have rolled a 20 for the death saving throw.


Published in Primal Power, page(s) 85.
Hope Beyond Death.flavor: Although winter might empty fields, cast leaves from trees, and freeze rivers, the world blooms anew at spring’s return.
Hope Beyond Death.trigger: An ally within 10 squares of you fails a death saving throw
Hope Beyond Death.effect: The target is considered to have rolled a 20 for the death saving throw.
